options.label: Twin-Plot
options.fig.cap: Number of bomber missions flown and amount of bombs dropped by the Allied Powers over the course of the war in all theaters of battle.

options.label: By-Country-Plot
options.fig.cap: Number of missions flown by each Allied country over the course of the war in all theaters of battle. Unidentified may represent joint missions.

options.label: By-Theater-Plot
options.fig.cap: Amount of bombs dropped by the Allied Powers over the course of the war in each theater.

options.label: Twin-Maps
options.fig.cap: Distribution of Allied bomber missions during the war plotted on reginal maps map. Left image contains Europe and Mediterranean data. Right contains Pacific and China data.
